name: Camp Buddy 3D
description:
What is Camp Buddy 3D?

Camp Buddy 3D is a fan project that aims to to re-make part of the original Camp Buddy.

Camp Buddy is a Boys Love / Yaoi Visual Novel that features the adventures of Keitaro Nagame in the summer scout-themed camp called ‘Camp Buddy’, developed by Blits Games.

You can purchase the original or other games by Blits here:
https://www.blitsgames.com/

Features:

You can currently only fly around and explore the campgrounds.

This is a pre-alpha look at the environments that will be used in the final.

There is a lot that still needs to be added and fixed before we reach Beta.

BTW, fly into one of the cabin doors to enter the cabins.

Known Issues:
  • The biggest issue is currently optimization. Turn down the view distance if you encounter a lot of lag.
  • Not all resolutions are currently supported, but will be soon.
  • There is no sound yet :( Sorry
How do I open the game?
  1. Click on "Download now".
  2. In Google Drive click on "Download All" in the top right corner.
  3. A file will start downloading.
  4. Right click and choose extract on the downloaded file. (Take note of where you are extracting it)
  5. Go into the game folder and double click CB3D.exe. Wait a moment for the game to open.
Minimum PC specifications:

You currently need a beefy PC to play, but as the game becomes more optimized the requirements won't be so high.

  • CPU: Intel i3 
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB 
  • Operating System: Windows (Future updates will include more platforms)
